name: Great Lakes Dredge & Dock Corporation
description: Great Lakes Dredge & Dock Corporation is the largest provider of dredging services in the United States and a leading provider of environmental and marine construction services. Founded in 1890, the company has a long history of delivering high-quality dredging and marine construction solutions to various sectors, including government, commercial, and private clients. Great Lakes specializes in dredging projects that involve the removal of sediment and debris from waterways, ports, and harbors to ensure safe navigation and maintain water quality. The company also engages in land reclamation, beach nourishment, and coastal restoration projects, contributing to sustainable development and environmental protection. With a fleet of advanced dredging equipment and a highly skilled workforce, Great Lakes is committed to efficiency, safety, and innovation in its operations. The company plays a vital role in enhancing the nation's infrastructure and environmental resilience, making it a key player in the maritime industry.

seo.meta_title: Great Lakes Dredge & Dock Corporation | Dredging and Marine Construction Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Great Lakes Dredge & Dock Corporation, the largest dredging contractor in the U.S. specializing in marine construction and environmental services.

faq.question: What services does Great Lakes offer?
faq.answer: Great Lakes offers dredging services, marine construction, land reclamation, and coastal restoration.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Great Lakes Dredge & Dock?
faq.answer: L. R. (Randy) Stokes is the CEO of Great Lakes Dredge & Dock Corporation.

faq.question: Where is Great Lakes Dredge & Dock headquartered?
faq.answer: Great Lakes Dredge & Dock is headquartered in Houston, Texas, USA.

faq.question: When was Great Lakes Dredge & Dock founded?
faq.answer: Great Lakes Dredge & Dock was founded in 1890.
